World_Language_Recommendation: 2 years required for admission. 3+ years of the same language recommended to be competitive.

Major_Specific_Recommendations.Academic_Strength_Emphasis: The 'Three Pillars': 1) Academics, 2) Leadership, 3) Fitness. Requires a Congressional nomination, passing a fitness test, and strong academics. Must be a proven leader.

Achieve a high rank (e.g., Eagle Scout, Gold Award, JROTC)
Start training for the Candidate Fitness Assessment (CFA) NOW
